title: Project-Based Learning Design to Strengthen Instructional Design Competencies in Higher Vocational Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of secondary education curriculum, foundational language education theory, basic instructional methodologies
context.additional_context: Prospective teachers simulate current teachers' roles to develop instructional design competencies applicable to real-world work environments

learning_goals: Learners can convert curriculum objectives into specific instructional activities by applying the ISD (Instructional Systems Design) model.
Learners can create an instructional design plan based on learner needs through problem analysis in the field of language education.
Learners can design systematic evaluation tools, including formative assessments, in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment.
Learners can complete the diagnosis-design-development-evaluation phases of an instructional design project through team collaboration.

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Notion, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
